subject: Child Abuse and Neglect

Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Nearly everything about the investigation into child sexual abuse allegations against Bernie Fine, a former assistant basketball coach at Syracuse, took a more serious turn over the weekend.
snippet: Nearly everything about the investigation into child sexual abuse allegations against Bernie Fine, a former assistant basketball coach at Syracuse, took a more serious turn over the weekend.
